siteTitle: JungleCode - Your Strategic Partner for Japan Market Entry

hero.title: Let's Build Your Japan Success
hero.subtitle: Together we'll navigate Japan's $9 trillion economy, combining your vision with our local market knowledge.

about.title: We'll Land Your Vision Together
about.description: Our partnership offers strategic insights rooted in shared experience. Together we'll navigate cultural expectations, business norms, and legal frameworks for your AI success in Japan. Whether you're exploring or scaling, we'll move forward together with purpose and momentum.

mission.title: Our Commitment
mission.text: To grow alongside your AI venture in Japan through mutual understanding and collaborative support.

keyPoints.title: Cultural Insight
keyPoints.description: Our success in Japan becomes yours.

keyPoints.title: Strategic Guidance
keyPoints.description: We meet you at your journey stage.

keyPoints.title: Trusted Access
keyPoints.description: We open doors to valuable relationships.

challenges.title: Challenges We Navigate Together
challenges.intro: Our journey into Japan involves unique challenges—from relationship-based buying to regulatory complexities and cultural communication. We'll overcome each barrier together, combining your vision with our local context.

challenges.title: Shared Market Knowledge
challenges.challenge: It's hard to know what's working — or even who to talk to.
challenges.solution: We help you understand how the market works and where your opportunity actually lies.

challenges.title: Relationship Building
challenges.challenge: No matter how great your offering is, cold starts rarely go anywhere.
challenges.solution: We bring you into trusted conversations that lead to real traction.

challenges.title: Cultural Alignment
challenges.challenge: Even small things — like silence or seating — carry meaning here.
challenges.solution: We coach you on the unspoken rules that build confidence and trust.

challenges.title: Communication Balance
challenges.challenge: Overexplaining can come off as insecure or pushy.
challenges.solution: We help you strike the right balance — clear, calm, and intentional.

challenges.title: Regulatory Partnership
challenges.challenge: The rules aren't always obvious — until they stop your momentum.
challenges.solution: We give you clarity early, so you can move forward without worry.

challenges.title: Trust Development
challenges.challenge: Japan expects more than just a good product — they expect reliability.
challenges.solution: We help you show you're serious — and build the kind of trust that lasts.

services.title: Our Partnership Services
services.subtitle: We'll walk this journey together—from initial planning to lasting partnerships and sustainable growth.

primary.title: Entry Planning
primary.description: Together we'll build your foundation—creating a market approach that honors local context and supports your growth.
features: Clarity on what Japan really needs
Strategy grounded in timing and context

secondary.title: Connection Building
secondary.description: We'll introduce you to our network and help you develop meaningful relationships.

secondary.title: Market Alignment
secondary.description: We'll adapt your message together to resonate with local expectations and values.

steps.title: Mutual Discovery
steps.description: We explore your vision and assess our market fit together.

steps.title: Collaborative Planning
steps.description: We develop our shared roadmap based on mutual strengths.

steps.title: Joint Implementation
steps.description: We support your team through each step of market entry.

steps.title: Shared Growth
steps.description: We evolve our approach as your market presence develops.

whyJapan.title: Our Japan Opportunity
whyJapan.intro: Together we'll access Japan's advanced economy with its established structures, mutual trust, and collaborative innovation approach ideal for our market expansion.

sections.title: Our Market Potential
items: $9T economy with deep investments in automation and productivity
Large enterprise sector seeking scalable, long-term solutions
Strong alignment between public policy and innovation
Tech-savvy buyers who demand precision and trust
Strategic entry point for expansion across Asia

sections.title: Our Shared Advantages
items: High IP protection and low tolerance for bad actors
Government support for AI-driven transformation
Reliable, modern infrastructure across industries
High brand loyalty for trusted partners
Premium pricing accepted for proven performance

sections.title: Our Success Factors
items: Long-term partnerships built on credibility
High standards for transparency and reliability
Deep respect for quality, ethics, and craft
Preference for structured onboarding and integration
Clear expectations for support, compliance, and continuity

getStarted.title: Begin Our Partnership
getStarted.subtitle: Take your first step toward Japan with a collaborative approach and shared expertise.

consultationSteps.title: Partnership Discussion
items: Understand your objectives and entry motivation
Assess market timing and strategic alignment
Identify major risks and blockers
Outline our working model

consultationSteps.title: Mutual Assessment
items: Evaluate possible entry pathways
Estimate resources and internal readiness
Map your positioning and messaging
Share early recommendations

consultationSteps.title: Collaborative Roadmap
items: Provide a structured roadmap
Detail services, scope, and timelines
Align on investment and team fit
Set the foundation for launch

contact.title: Start Your Japan Partnership
contact.subtitle: Share your vision and timeline. We'll respond with a collaborative approach within 48 hours.

formPlaceholders.name: Full name
formPlaceholders.industry: What area of AI are you focused on?
formPlaceholders.objectives: Key outcomes you want to achieve in Japan

team.name: Jet Villegas
team.bio: We bring you 6+ years of engineering leadership experience in Tokyo, where we've directed global teams across three continents. Our work has reached billions worldwide, from browser innovations to job platforms. Together, we'll apply our AI insights to your Japan market journey.

team.name: Aditya Pandya
team.bio: Our partnership offers 5+ years of product leadership in Japan, where we've scaled platforms from 150M to 2.1B applications. We've built products reaching over 100M people and generating $6B+ revenue. Together, we'll develop your AI product strategy for Japanese success.
